laboratory_examinations.findings: Diffuse elevated FDG uptake along the entire colorectum; SUVmax ranged from 5.0 to 20.1 compared with the hepatic SUVmax of 2.3. Focal enlarged lymph nodes with increased FDG uptake noted.

Numerous polyps ranging from 0.6 to 1.0 cm in diameter observed; biopsies revealed ulceration and moderately differentiated adenocarcinoma in rectal polyps, and tubular adenoma in transverse colon and sigmoid colon polyps.
